original_text: With them was every different kind of wild animal and every different kind of farm animal. They also had with them every kind of living thing that moves along the ground. Every different kind of bird and other flying things were there too.
korean_text: 그들과 모든 들짐승이 그 종류대로, 모든 가축이 그 종류대로, 땅에 기는 모든 것이 그 종류대로, 모든 새가 그 종류대로

sentences.original_text: With them was every different kind of wild animal
sentences.korean_translation: 그들과 함께 모든 종류의 들짐승이 있었고

sentences.original_text: and every different kind of farm animal
every kind of living thing that moves along the ground
sentences.korean_translation: 땅을 기어 다니는 모든 종류의 살아있는 것을

sentences.original_text: and other flying things were there too
